remarks: If ` A ` is colinear with ` B ` and ` C ` , then ` A ` is in the same space as ` B ` .  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 25-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement: colineardim1 $p |- ( ( N e. NN /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. ( EE ` N ) /\ C e. W ) ) -> ( A Colinear <. B , C >. -> A e. ( EE ` N ) ) ) $.
